pullrequest.title: Communication model based on graph cost

content.raw:
Exactly, the purpose is to get the vertex ID for the graph.

We could get the vertex Id at runtime but we would need to check AABB collisions between the current model’s bounding box and the rest of the tiles. This might be computational expensive, as this is something to do every iteration.
content.html:
Exactly, the purpose is to get the vertex ID for the graph.

We could get the vertex Id at runtime but we would need to check AABB collisions between the current model’s bounding box and the rest of the tiles. This might be computational expensive, as this is something to do every iteration.
